keywordspec.name: FileLibrary
keywordspec.doc: FileLibrary is a Robot Framework test library for generating test data files. Built in variables: now

kw.name: Concatenate Files
kw.doc: Concatenate multiple files into a single file.

kw.name: Connect
kw.doc: Connect to database using the specified arguments

kw.name: Execute SQL
kw.doc: Execute SQL statement(s). Specify either an SQL to execute or the path to a .sql file.

kw.name: Get Template Data
kw.doc: Get a specific value from the template data context.

kw.name: Log Template Data
kw.doc: Print all content of the template data as JSON. When an optional file name argument is supplied, the template context is saved as a JSON File.

kw.name: Reset Template Data
kw.doc: Clear the template data. All existing data. When the optional argument True is given; the cleared template data will be preloaded with test variables.

kw.name: Set Query Time Out
kw.doc: Set query timeout. Default timeout is 30 seconds.

kw.name: Set Template Data
kw.doc: Set a variable in the template context.

kw.name: Set Template Data From SQL
Verify Files Are Equal
kw.doc: Compare the content of two files.

kw.name: Verify SQL Result
kw.doc: Execute a SQL statement or .sql file and verify that returned values match the expected values.

kw.name: Zip Files
kw.doc: Compress multiple files into a single zip file.
